page.title: 04CHRISTLETON MONDAY PART 1
page.content: {It's Monday 28th April 1985} My name is Hayley,I'm ten years old and live in Christleton with my brother James and Mum and Dad. My clock-radio wakes me up at 7.45am. We breakfast together on orange juice, cornflakes, toast, tea and a vitamin tablet. I attend Christleton Primary School while James goes to the High School. Dad works for IBM Computers and has to travel around the North West each day. Mum works part-time at a local Steakhouse. I had a busy morning in school before eating a school lunch of meat,potatoes,cabbage, cake and a glass of water.At lunchtime I went to Country Dance Club and during the afternoon followed the History Trail an exciting TV history serial.School ended at 4.00 after an enjoyable Choir Practice. (Part 2 continued on Page 5)
